keyvals.desc: Comma seperated Registry keys for views to be displayed in the Account Banner. Views can be rearranged/deleted/added by modifiying order of these keys.

keyvals.desc: Within the newsfeed, sub-categories for various newsfeed categories
Add comma separated OPSS Resource Types(values) for authorization. Also these resource types should be defined in OPSS. Please note that the key should not be changed here.

Here searchTemplateKey will act as the value of the search dropdown option. The value of searchTemplateKey i.e. accountSearch will act as search template name The searchTemplateName corresponds to the text of search dropdown option The value of searchTemplateName i.e. SEARCH_OPTION_ACCOUNTS corresponds to the key to resource bundle
List of all available css files, 'true' entry of activeTheme key represent the active theme

keyvals.desc: List of supported batch payment types
Organization Heirarchy types including the name, id and the icon

Holds the value of server time zone. If this entry is set, Billing Care will use the same for date processing. By default, the entry is empty and weblogic's timezone is used.
You can use either of the following options to specify the timezone value
Option 1: Timezone name Use this option when your timezone is changing due to DST. This is the recommended option even if DST is not used. For example: America/Los_Angeles Timezone name should be exactly same as the timezones supported by Java/Joda database at http://joda-time.sourceforge.net/timezones.html
Option 2: Offset value If your timezone need to be constant/fixed, then you can use this option if needed. For example: +0430 Offset value should be 5 characters long, should start with a sign (+ or -), and should have hours followed by minutes.

flags.desc: Include the salutation field in the Account Profile overlay,Account Banner and in all the dialog titles.
Include notes indicators on the bill history graph
Displays the bill unit's ISO currency code in the account banner
If value is true then displays the bill invoice in a modal dialog.
Payment Batch Process is set to 'OFF' by default, If this is enabled to true then the Batch payments imported in to the Batch Payments UI will start processing automatically.

thresholds.desc: Maximum number of records to be retrieved in account search dialog. Default is 50, and increase or decrease the limit if you would like to see more or less records. Set a valid positive non-zero integer as a limit.
pagination size for payment suspense search
pagination size for collections bill unit search
Number of days prior to credit card expiration to alert

The PCM Connection timeout value in milliseconds. The timeout is for every opcode call across Billing Care and the timeout is handled in places like bills tab (ex: if there is timeout, then user must do a search in bills tab).A change in the timeout value will need a server restart as the connection pool needs to be reinitialized.
Number of seconds to warn user before Billing Care session timeout similar to the idle timeout in weblogic
Number of days prior to expiration a package can be purchased during registration or package purchase
Threshold value for percentage of payments that are going into suspense.If exceeded batch payments processing will be terminated

Maximum number of records to be retrieved in device search dialog.Default is 50.Increase or decrease the limit if you would like to see more or less records.Set a valid positive non-zero integer as a limit.

Number of roles to be fetched in each batch while retrieving the user list from external LDAP. This configuration entry is introduced for performance reasons and there will not be any visible changes to Billing Care UI based on this configuration. For ex: if there are 5000 roles in the user store, retrieving all the roles in one shot may have timeout issues from the user store, hence this configuration entry is introduced to control the number of roles retrieved per batch internally. This is only applicable if both underlying repository and the provider support paging of results. By default, the value is 500. Set it to an optimal number based on the configurations in your environment.

mapping.desc: Contact Types for account
Status Types for account.Note - It requires customizations in the BRM side to add a new status type
Account Phone Types
Customer Types

As the browser language codes and BRM language codes are different (Not just hyphen replacement). This configuration acts like a mapping. ID represents browser language and key represents BRM language
Tax Exemption Types. Note - Make sure BRM supports the tax exemption when you add a new type
Billing Frequency Options for Bill Unit.Note: SDK developer can add "6" months as an option in the drop down

Accounting Types for Bill Unit.Note : BRM only supports Balance forward, and Open item accounting. If you are adding a new accounting type, make sure you have done the necessary customizations in BRM side.

Registry keys for rendering payment method views in Bill Unit Screen, Payment Methods Screen and Make payment dialog.Though "paymentTypes" has an entry for "invoice", when this is used in Make Payment Dialog, invoice payment will be ignored while rendering the payment method views
Direct Debit Account Types.Note - It requires customizations in the BRM side to add a new accounting type
Invoice Payment Method Delivery Types.Note - BRM supports "Fax" with the value "2" as a preference type. If customer need it, they can add this map in the CustomConfigurations.xml
Mandate type options for creating SEPA payment method
Service types icons to be displayed for customer Assets.If no iconKey and icon are provided for any services then default icon will be used.Optimum Image dimension is 116 x 116 pixels
Invoice Types for Corrective Bill Generation.
Invoice Formats for Corrective Bill Generation.
Action status for collections
Status for deferred action
Default values for state of the device sim, used while associating SIM for telco service
Available wireless network element, used while associating SIM/NUM for telco service
Default unassigned states of the device number, used while associating number for telco service
Default number categories of device number, used while associating number for telco service
Available vanity for device number, used while associating number for telco service

keyvals.desc: Account Creation framework configuration used to render the train stops and labels for the footer.And "key" is also used as registry entry to fetch views/viewmodels for the corresponding train stops
Product Catalogue framework configuration used to render the train stops and labels for the footer.And "key" is also used as registry entry to fetch views/viewmodels for the corresponding train stops

Specify the name of the package list which contains the packages to be shown during the account creation. Default is "CSR". Other possible values are "default" (which would return the packages from "default-new") or any other custom package list. If package list name is not specified, then the packages from the "default-new" will be displayed.

Specify the name of the package list which contains the packages to be shown during the purchase. Default is "default". Other possible values are "CSR". If package list name is not specified, then the packages from the "default-new" will be displayed.

Mapping for tagging the package. Here key is regular expression to match the package name or "Uncategoried" and value is the tag name. If a package name matches the regular expression, those packages will be tagged with corresponding tags. Packages which doesn't match mapping rules would land under "*" pattern value.

Mapping for two-tier suspense reason filtering. Here key is regular expression to match the detailed reason description and value is the higher level reason. If a reason description matches the regular expression, those reasons will be grouped with corresponding higher level reason otherwise will be grouped under "Uncategorized".If icon property is available with resource path corresponding grouped payements shown with it otherwise "Uncategorized" icons shown by default
Batch Payment Active/History Page tab.

Date format for the batch payments.The default format supports date of formats 23-Mar-16,23-Mar-2016,23-December-16,23-December-2016. Provide a desired supported value for this key as per format of the date entered in batch payment file. The more commonly used patterns can be used by a combination of y (representing a year digit), M (representing a month digit) and d (representing a date digit).

thresholds.desc: Threshold value for showing number of services in Balances section.If exceeded, remaining services will be shown/hidden on click of Show More/Less link respectively
Threshold value for showing number of service Types in Assets section.If exceeded, remaining service Types will be shown/hidden on click of Show More/Less link respectively

keyvals.desc: Comma separated list of payment types to be excluded from the payment suspense flow. By default, Credit Card and Direct Debit payment types (i.e. 10003,10005) are ignored from payment suspense flow since they are BRM initiated payment types.

mapping.desc: Bill Unit status for collections

keyvals.desc: Comma separated list of thresholds percentages use in setting credit thresholds for both currency and non currency resources
